dict.acceptation: 建立，创建；确立或使安全；使被安排好；使成为；

sent.orig: To establish oneself in the world, one dies all one can to seem to establish there.
sent.trans: 为了要在世上立足，人会尽其所能地务求看上去好象已经站稳了似的。

sent.orig: Men establish the world and women establish men.
sent.trans: 男人创造世界，女人创造男人。

sent.orig: She suggested Liberia Liberian lawmakers establish establish a code of conduct to hold each other accountable.
sent.trans: 她建议利比里亚的立法者应该建立一套管理代码，从而是彼此负责。

sent.orig: As the enterprise should establish its own special culture, library also should establish the library culture.
sent.trans: 如同企业建设自己特有的企业文化一样，图书馆也应建设图书馆文化。

sent.orig: Article 7 The FFEs should establish certain training programmes for their employees.
sent.trans: 第七条企业应当建立职业培训制度，对职工进行职业培训。
